h2_title: Tiger Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide
content: Be ready for him to begin by quickly strafing to your side before launching into a flying punch. Moves like this will take him a moment to get up from the slam, giving you a good amount of time to start a light combo on him.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Tiger Vanguard Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
Be ready for him to begin by quickly strafing to your side before launching into a flying punch. Moves like this will take him a moment to get up from the slam, giving you a good amount of time to start a light combo on him.
